arts.ttl: Simeone lauds Álvarez & Reinildo after dramatic Atlético win over Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid coach Diego Simeone lauded his team after the dramatic comeback win over Xabi Alonso’s Bayer Leverkusen in the UEFA Champions League to seal a 2-1 victory having been down to 10 men for most of the game. We talked at halftime, we identified perfectly the game we had to play and we chose how to face the second half.

arts.ttl: Julian Alvarez at the double as Atletico Madrid seal comeback win
arts.sum: Piero Hincapie had headed Bayer Leverkusen in front before he followed Atleti’s Pablo Barrios in being sent off.

arts.ttl: CHAMPIONS LEAGUE PLAYER RATINGS | Atletico Madrid 2-1 Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen left frustrated as they let slip their lead and conceded a late winner to lose 2-1 to Atletico Madrid in the Spanish capital. The majority of the first…

arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Atletico Madrid vs Bayer Leverkusen
arts.sum: The lineups have been announced for tonight's clash in Madrid as Bundesliga champions Bayer Leverkusen take on Atletico Madrid in a heavyweight clash.

arts.ttl: The last time Atletico Madrid and Bayer Leverkusen met chaos ensued
arts.sum: Could Atletico Madrid and Bayer Leverkusen repeat the chaotic classic that was their last encounter? Say what you will about the new Champions League format, it has served up a number of mouthwatering ties this season. It’s had its fair share of duds, no doubt, but we’ve also gotten matchups that will be remembered for […] The post The last time Atletico Madrid and Bayer Leverkusen met chaos ensued first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Barcelona to scout Jonathan Tah, Florian Wirtz - sources
arts.sum: Barcelona representatives will watch Bayer Leverkusen duo Jonathan Tah and Florian Wirtz in Tuesday's Champions League game at Atlético Madrid, sources have confirmed to ESPN. Since joining from Hamburg in 2015, Tah has made over 350 appearances for Leverkusen and been capped 33 times by Germany .

arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso responds to fresh Real Madrid job speculation
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso has long been linked as Carlo Ancelotti's successor at Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: One in, two out: Atlético Madrid announce their matchday squad to take on Bayer Leverkusen in the Champions League
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid are set to host German champions Bayer Leverkusen at the Estadio Metropolitano this evening as Diego Simeone’s men chase a top-8 spot in the league phase of the…

arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen will look to try and boost squad options in this window
arts.sum: kicker reports that Bayer Leverkusen will now look to boost their options within the squad, especially after the injury to Martin Terrier on Saturday evening. The main area of improvement will…

arts.ttl: Boniface returns to Leverkusen squad for Atletico clash
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso has confirmed that Victor Boniface will make his long-awaited return to the Bayer Leverkusen squad for Tuesday's Champions League match against Atletico Madrid.
